channel.title: Urgently need help [508]
channel.description:
Ok, please help me with this, for like the 100th time...
Say Player2 kills an NPC, Player1 gets the drop, and this prints:
[CODE] Exception dropping item: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 [/CODE]
Can you help me with this please? Also tell me if you need any code.
